definitions.text: expel or eject (saliva or phlegm or sputum) from the mouth
examples: The father of the victim spat at the alleged murderer

definitions.text: eject or send out in large quantities, also metaphorical
examples: the volcano spews out molten rocks every day
The editors of the paper spew out hostile articles about the Presidential candidate

definitions.text: eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
examples: After drinking too much, the students vomited
The patient regurgitated the food we gave him last night
